title: AWS Network Operations to Azure Network Management: Monitoring, Troubleshooting, and Optimization
description: Master advanced network operations by implementing comprehensive network monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimization with AWS network management services and migrating to Azure equivalents with automated operations, performance optimization, and intelligent network management.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive network monitoring and observability solutions
Build automated network troubleshooting and incident response workflows
Create network performance optimization and capacity planning systems
Design network analytics and intelligent operations platforms
Implement network cost optimization and resource management
Build network compliance monitoring and audit frameworks
prerequisites: Completion of previous ANS-C01 labs (Network Design, Network Implementation)
Strong understanding of network protocols and troubleshooting methodologies
Experience with monitoring tools and network management platforms
Familiarity with network automation and operational procedures
businessScenario: NetOps Enterprise manages complex network infrastructures for global organizations requiring 24/7 network operations, advanced monitoring, and predictive maintenance. Their network operations team needs comprehensive tools for monitoring, troubleshooting, optimization, and automated incident response. They must master both AWS and Azure network management capabilities to ensure optimal network performance, availability, and cost efficiency.

troubleshooting.issue: Complex network performance issues spanning multiple layers and services
troubleshooting.solution: Implement multi-layer monitoring and correlation, use distributed tracing, implement performance profiling, use network simulation, and implement automated root cause analysis

troubleshooting.issue: Alert fatigue and false positives in network monitoring systems
troubleshooting.solution: Implement intelligent alerting with machine learning, use alert correlation and suppression, implement context-aware alerting, use alert tuning, and implement escalation policies

troubleshooting.issue: Network capacity planning challenges in dynamic cloud environments
troubleshooting.solution: Implement predictive analytics and machine learning, use historical trend analysis, implement automated scaling policies, use capacity modeling, and implement cost optimization
